section.name: Overview
section.p: Here are settings for the job.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click the job management.

subsection.name: The name
subsection.p: It is the name that appears in the list.

subsection.name: Target
subsection.p: You can use as an identifier for whether or not to run when the target job command to run directly in the batch, etc.. If the crawl command execution, do not specify 'all'.

subsection.name: Schedule
subsection.p: Configure schedule settings. Run jobs written in script on a schedule you set here.

Description format describes the format such as Cron seconds minutes date month day year (optional)". For example, "0 0 12? * WED ' for if the weekly Wednesday 12:00 pm job to run. About how to specify the finer "Quartz"Please see.

subsection.name: How to run
subsection.p: Specifies the script execution environment. At the moment supports only the 'groovy'.

section.name: Script
section.p: Written in the language specified in how to perform job run.

section.name: Log
section.p: To enable records to the job log.

subsection.name: Crawling jobs
subsection.p: In turn treated as crawl jobs. In establishing the system crawl started and stopped.

subsection.name: State
subsection.p: Specifies the enabled or disabled status of the job. If the job will not run.

subsection.name: Sort
subsection.p: Specifies the display order in the job list.
